comment: Restricted quantitifer version of one direction of ~ 19.27 . (The other direction holds when ` A ` is nonempty, see ~ r19.27zv .) (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 17-Jun-2023.)
